issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Left outer join on bucketed table on certain cases gives wrong results.

Depending on the order in which the table-scans are walked through, the FilterPruner might end up using the wrong table scan's table properties on the other table.
fields.summary: Bucket  pruning: Left Outer Join on bucketed table gives wrong result
